src:
#MesadeAnálisis: si Estados Unidos quiere apoyar que persiga a cárteles que exportan armas | Video
 by Redacción AN / OC



Alfredo Figueroa, exconsejero electoral, y Gabriel Reyes Orona, exprocurador fiscal, analizan la respuesta del Estado mexicano y las consecuencias políticas y diplomáticas de la masacre a la familia LeBarón: Reyes Orona afirma que Donald Trump ofrece ayuda porque quiere capitalizarla con fines políticos. Figueroa reflexiona sobre la complicidad que hemos tenido todos al no poder construir un Estado eficaz para perseguir a los criminales.
text:
# MesadeAnlisis: if the United States wants to support pursuing cartels that export weapons | Video
 by AN / OC Writing



Alfredo Figueroa, former electoral councilor, and Gabriel Reyes Orona, former prosecutor, analyze the response of the Mexican State and the political and diplomatic consequences of the massacre to the LeBarón family: Reyes Orona states that Donald Trump offers help because he wants to capitalize on it for political purposes. Figueroa reflects on the complicity we all had when we could not build an effective state to prosecute criminals.
